QuestData.Title: Pro-liberation
QuestData.Description: I knew these guys would be trouble as soon as we started building this tower. Scoffing our bribes. Stealing our workers.$B$BLabor isn't cheap with all the construction in Azshara. I need those men back!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Ironwrought Keys from cultists and dragonkin to free 4 Goblin Workers in Sable Ridge.
QuestData.CompletionText: There's no way I'm paying them for time in captivity. Greedy little punks.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks there, pal. Here's your commission.$B$BIf you'll excuse me, I've gotta get these slackers back to work.
